name: Anneliese
description: The kind princess from 'The Princess and the Pauper,' who values duty but yearns for freedom and simple life.

name: Merliah
description: A champion surfer who discovers she is half-mermaid and must save the ocean kingdom of Oceana.

name: Keira
description: The ambitious pop star twin in 'The Princess and the Popstar,' who trades places with a princess.

name: Genevieve
description: One of the 12 dancing princesses, known for her love of ballet and adventure.

name: Tori
description: The modern princess in 'The Princess and the Popstar' who trades places with a famous singer.

name: Liana
description: A free-spirited peasant girl who finds a magical mirror and goes on an adventure with her best friend.

name: Corrine
description: One of the three swashbuckling musketeers who dreams of joining the royal guard.

name: Blair
description: A kind girl who finds herself attending a secret academy and discovers she is a princess.

name: Erika
description: A poor seamstress and singer in 'The Princess and the Pauper' who dreams of singing on stage.

name: Mariposa
description: The courageous butterfly fairy who sets out to save her Queen and the Land of Flutterfield.
